title: JSON schema for MCBE Utilities docgen configuration files

root.description: Specify the root folder in which all generated *.d.ts files are located.
root.markdownDescription:
Specify the root folder in which all generated *.d.ts files are located.

[See more](https://mcbe-utilities.github.io/docgen/CONFIG#root)

out.description: Specify the folder to output all generated MDX files to.
out.markdownDescription:
Specify the folder to output all generated MDX files to.

[See more](https://mcbe-utilities.github.io/docgen/CONFIG#out)

mixins.description: Specify a glob or an array of glob patterns pointing to files/folders to copy to the final output.
mixins.markdownDescription:
Specify a glob or an array of glob patterns pointing to files/folders to copy to the final output.

[See more](https://mcbe-utilities.github.io/docgen/CONFIG#mixins)

resolvers.description: Provide an object of foreign module documentation resolvers.
resolvers.markdownDescription:
Provide an object of foreign module documentation resolvers.

[See more](https://mcbe-utilities.github.io/docgen/CONFIG#resolvers)

additionalProperties.description: Link to concatenate foreign object names to or an object with foreign objects and their respective links.
additionalProperties.markdownDescription:
Link to concatenate foreign object names to or an object with foreign objects and their respective links..

[See more](https://mcbe-utilities.github.io/docgen/CONFIG#resolvers)

ignore.description: Specify a glob or an array of glob ignore patterns.
ignore.markdownDescription:
Specify a glob or an array of glob ignore patterns.

[See more](https://mcbe-utilities.github.io/docgen/CONFIG#ignore)
